alert.note: Alert for Avoyelles; Evangeline; St. Landry (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 6:23PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Evangeline, southwestern Avoyelles and central St. Landry Parishes through 700 PM CDT... At 623 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Indian Lake, or 7 miles northeast of Ville Platte. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Opelousas, Ville Platte, Leonville, Morrow, Port Barre, Washington, Bayou Chicot, Prairie Ronde, Indian Lake, Chicot State Park, Lawtell, Whiteville, Grand Prairie and St. Landry. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 13 and 46. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
